text: I tried to use "XPath Assertion" for "HTTP Sampler" with the following situation. But it didn't work. JMeter said "No Nodes Matched". Response: : 日本語 : XPath: //a[text()='日本語'] There is no problem when using English. Response: : English : XPath: //a[text()='English']

That's because the XML entities are not replaced in the XPath expression, whereas they are replaced in the HTML. Try for example & with XPath: //a[text()='&'] For further info please see XPath documentation - it's not a JMeter issue.
